Html:
Hello.
Is there a way to search by keywords (using SetCurrentPositionByKeywords) offline? Maybe I can somehow pre-cache map locations? Similar to how I can pre-cache tiles and then load them from a hard drive when i dont have an active internet connection.
Thx.
when you call SetCurrentPositionByKeywords or use any other provider function, it's cached already, if you call the same function with the same parameters, you'll get result from the cache

Yes, i get that. But to cache a response i need to get it from the web server first. And i cant do that offline. Neither can i guess all the possible keyword combinations to cache the responses beforehand.
